name: Step By Step (itch) (Krzysztof, Indago)
description:
This game was made in an 48h game jam about accessability - PGG Jam: All Play vol.4.

It tells the story of a girl who knew what she wanted to do in life - regardless of the obstacles in her way.

Made by :

Krzysztof Lewicki

Krzysztof Skoracki

Paweł Homenko

Voiceover:

Other wonderful jammers!
